results.name: Inverse permutation of A163328.
link: A. Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..6560
Index entries for sequences that are permutations of the natural numbers
program: (define (A001477bi x y) (/ (+ (expt (+ x y) 2) x (* 3 y)) 2))
xref: Inverse: A163328. a(n) = A163331(A163327(n)). A054239 is an analogous sequence for binary. Cf. A007089.
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Jul 29 2009
